'''3D''' was a joke item that was added in [[Java Edition 3D Shareware v1.34]] and is exclusive to that version.

== Obtaining ==
=== Mob drops ===
3D was dropped by a [[Nerd Creeper]], which is summoned via the cheat code "NEEEERD".

== Usage ==
Eating the 3D item when the hunger bar is not full shows a picture of the developer cast of {{MC}} at the time. Hovering over it in the [[inventory]] says "Tasty!" in constantly changing [[formatting codes]].
